item.title: Cross-JDK Compilation in SBT
item.description: Recently, I had to cross-compile a bunch of Scala library repositories for JDK 11 and JDK 17. I was hoping SBT would natively support specifying the related configuration in build.sbt similar to crossScalaVersions. I came across some references to plugins that seemed to do the job. But I couldn’t find anything in their documentation that proved they supported compiling for different JDK versions. They only seemed1 to provide better management and configuration options for cross compiling different Scala versions.
